get.description: Returns all matching cost accounting entries.

parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all entries since the specified date time.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all entries since the specified change id.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Get the entries of the specified company number.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the entry.

parameters.name: entryNo
parameters.description: Entry number of the cost accounting entry. May be used together with the company number.

parameters.name: externalEntryId
parameters.description: External entry id of the cost accounting entry.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

get.description: Returns all matching cost accounting journals.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all entries since the specified date time.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all entries since the specified change id.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Get the entries of the specified company number.

parameters.name: journalId
parameters.description: Get the journal with the specified identification.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all entries which were added or edited since the date time specified.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all entries which were added or edited since the change id specified.

parameters.name: openItemId
parameters.description: Get the entry with the specified unique open item id.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Get all entries with the specified company number.

parameters.name: voucherType
parameters.description: Get all entries with the specified voucher type. Voucher no, voucher type and company no may be used together to identify the open items of a specifiy voucher.

parameters.name: voucherNo
parameters.description: Get all entries with the specified voucher number. Voucher no, voucher type and company no may be used together to identify the open items of a specifiy voucher.

parameters.name: financialInterfaceId
parameters.description: Get all the entries with the specified financial interface identification. Normally there is only one open item per voucher.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

put.summary: Set the status of an open item payment status.
put.description:
To settle an receivable, provide an identification for the open item which is either:
            
- Open Item No & Company No
            
- Voucher No, Voucher Type, Company No & Line No
            
- Financial Interface Id & line no
            
You must provide the amount which is still open. This allows to settle a receivable partly.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

entryId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the entry.

externalEntryId.description: Gets or sets id of the entry in the external system.

origin.description: Gets the entry's system of origin.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

entryNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of entry in combination with the CompanyNo. Not unique.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

orderNo.description: Gets or sets order no identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

salesChannel.description: Gets or sets the sales channel. May be used together with costCenterNo, CostUnitNo or orderNo.

costType.description: Gets or sets cost type of the entry.

period.description: Gets or sets accounting period of the entry.

budgetOrActual.description: Gets or sets B => Budget / I => Actual / P => Plan / K => Shortterm income statement.

voucherType.description: Gets or sets voucher type from financial accounting.

voucherNo.description: Gets or sets voucher number from financial accounting.

entryDate.description: Gets or sets date of the entry.

amountBSC.description: Gets or sets amount of the entry in balance sheet currency.

quantity.description: Gets or sets quantity in the unit defined on the cost type.

isMarkedForDeletion.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entry is going to be deleted in the next cost accounting processing.

isProcessed.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entry is processed and will therefore be shown in reports.

generated.description: Gets or sets the type of system generated entries. E => Debit bookings for combined cc & cu entries / F => Fix cost entries / K => Short term income statement / V => Cost allocation / Z => Additional entries / B => Credit bookings for allocations / T => Debit bookings for allocations.

financialDimensions.description: Gets a list of financial dimensions.

CostAccountingEntry.description: Represents a entry in the cost accounting.

costAccountingFinancialDimensionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the cost accounting financial dimension entry.

financialDimensionNo.description: Gets or sets the financial dimension.

financialDimensionValue.description: Gets or sets the financial dimension value.

CostAccountingFinancialDimension.description: Represents a cost accounting financial dimension entry.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

journalId.description: Gets or sets identification of the cost accountig journal.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company number of the cost accountig journal.

period.description: Gets or sets the period of the cost accountig journal.

journalEntries.description: Gets the list of journal entries.

caccJournalEntryId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the entry.

origin.description: Gets or sets the entry's system of origin.

originId.description: Gets or sets the identification of the entry's system of origin.

budgetOrActual.description: Gets or sets B => Budget / I => Actual / P => Plan / K => Shortterm income statement.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

orderNo.description: Gets or sets order no identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

salesChannel.description: Gets or sets the sales channel. May be used together with costCenterNo, CostUnitNo or orderNo.

costType.description: Gets or sets cost type of the entry.

voucherType.description: Gets or sets voucher type from financial accounting.

voucherNo.description: Gets or sets voucher number from financial accounting.

entryDate.description: Gets or sets date of the entry.

amountBSC.description:
Gets or sets amount of the entry in balance sheet currency.
Value has 18 digits before the decimal point and 2 decimal places.

quantity.description:
Gets or sets quantity in the unit defined on the cost type.
Value has 18 digits before the decimal point and 4 decimal places.

isReversal.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entry is a reversal.

financialDimensions.description: Gets a list of financial dimensions.

CostAccountingJournalEntry.description: Represents a entry in the cost accounting journal.

financialDimensionNo.description: Gets or sets the financial dimension.

financialDimensionValue.description: Gets or sets the financial dimension value.

CostAccountingJournalEntryFinancialDimen.description: Represents a cost accounting financial dimension of the journal entry.

changeId.description: Gets change id of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

articleId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the article.

origin.description: Gets the entry's system of origin.

externalArticleId.description: Gets or sets id of the article in the external system.

articleNo.description: Gets or sets article number for identification by the users.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

description.description: Gets or sets article description for external usage.

shortDescription.description: Gets or sets article description for internal usage.

stockUnitCode.description: Gets or sets c28 - Stock unit code.

priceUnitCode.description: Gets or sets c28 - Price unit code.

conversionFactorStockUnitPriceUnit.description: Gets or sets the conversion factor to convert StockUnit to PriceUnit e.g. 1 (stockUnitCode).

conversionFactorPriceUnitStockUnit.description: Gets or sets the conversion factor to convert PriceUnit to StockUnit e.g. 12 (priceUnitCode).

stockManagement.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the stock level is managed on a quantity basis.

inventoryManagement.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the stock level is managed on an inventory basis.

articleGroupCode.description: Gets or sets c459 - Article group code.

itemCategoryCode.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the item category.

itemMainGroupId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the item main group.

itemGroupId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the item group.

ean.description: Gets or sets the EAN of the article.

customsTariffNo.description: Gets or sets customs tariff number.

countryOfOrigin.description: Gets or sets ISO code of the country of origin.

intrastatCommodityCode.description: Gets or sets the C135 - Intrastat commodity code.

cn8Code.description: Gets or sets the CN8 Commodity Code.

language.description: Gets or sets language as ISO code.

description.description: Gets or sets full description in the given language.

shortDescription.description: Gets or sets short description in the given language.

MaterialManagementArticleLocalization.description: Represents a (material management) article localization entry.

changeId.description: Gets change id of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

priceId.description: Gets or sets internal identifier of the article price.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

origin.description: Gets the entry's system of origin.

externalPriceId.description: Gets or sets indentificaion of the article price in the external system.

articleId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the article.

articleNo.description: Gets or sets article number for identification together with 'articleNo'.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company for identification together with 'companyNo'.

priceTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c4074 - Type of price (standard, avarage, last purchase price).

validFrom.description: Gets or sets date from which the price entry is valid.

price.description: Gets or sets price per price Unit in balance sheet currency.

taxSystem.description: Gets or sets country of tax system as ISO code.

vatTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c83 - Tax type (normal rate, reduced rate,...).

MaterialManagementArticleVat.description: Represents a (material management) article vat entry.

attributeValueId.description: Gets or sets internal identification of attribute value.

attributeDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets internal identification of attribute definition.

modifyUser.description: Gets or sets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets or sets date the entry was last modified.

sortNo.description: Gets or sets position within the attribute value set.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

textValue.description: Gets or sets a string value.

numberValue.description: Gets or sets number or decimal value.

boolValue.description: Gets or sets a true or false value.

attributeSetId.description: Gets or sets internal identification of attribute set.

attributeValueSetId.description: Gets or sets internal identification of attribute value set.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

deliveryNoteId.description: Gets identification of the delivery note.

supplierDeliveryNoteNo.description: Gets or sets delivery note no of the supplier.

materialPostingTypeCode.description:
Gets or sets c412 - material posting type

4120010 - Input inventory

4120011 - Purchase receipt

4120012 - Purchase returns

4120013 - Production input

4120014 - Production returns

4120015 - Sales returns

4120016 - Cost center returns

4120017 - Order returns

4120020 - Production output

4120021 - Sales output

4120022 - Cost center output

4120023 - Store difference

4120024 - Order output

4120030 - Material transfer

4120031 - Reclassification.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company number of the delivery note.

deliveryDate.description: Gets date and time of the delivery.

warehouseId.description: Gets or sets identification of the warehouse.

targetWarehouseId.description: Gets or sets identification of the target warehouse in case of material transfer.

orderNo.description: Gets or sets the purchase, sales, production or material order.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center number.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit number.

isReversal.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this delivery note is a reversal.

reversedDeliveryNoteId.description: Gets identification of the reversed delivery note on the reversal delivery note.

reversalDeliveryNoteId.description: Gets identification of the reversal delivery note on the reversed delivery note.

positions.description: Gets list of positions of the delivery note.

positionNo.description: Gets position number in the delivery note.

positionSequenceNo.description:
Gets sequence number in the delivery note position.
Normaly 1, 2 for the add posting in case of a material transfer.

orderPosNo.description: Gets position number of the order position.

articleNo.description: Gets or sets article number for identification by the users.

quantityInStockUnit.description: Gets or sets delivery quantity in stock units.

remarks.description: Gets or sets remarks for the delivery note position.

materialPostings.description: Gets list of material postings for the managed articles.

invoiceId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

originId.description: Gets or sets id in the system of origin.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

invoiceTypeCode.description:
Gets or sets c2471 - Type of invoice

24710001 - invoice

24710002 - credit note.

voucherType.description: Gets or sets voucher type for accounting system.

voucherNo.description: Gets or sets voucher number for accounting system.

entryDate.description: Gets or sets entry date of the invoice.

valueDate.description: Gets or sets value date of the invoice.

vatDate.description: Gets or sets relevant date for tax.

period.description:
Gets or sets accounting period of the invoice.
Format YYYYMM (e.g. 202401).

accountPayableNo.description:
Gets or sets number of the account payable.
The supplier number or the account payable number must be specified.

supplierNo.description:
Gets or sets supplier number of the invoice.
The supplier number or the account payable number must be specified.

supplierInvoiceNo.description: Gets or sets invoice number of the supplier.

currency.description: Gets or sets ISO code of the currency.

exchangeRate.description:
Gets or sets exchange rate used for invoice when not in balance sheet currency.
Use 1 when invoice is in balance sheet currency.
If the exchange rate is not specified, it is determined using the entry date.

invoiceStatusCode.description:
Gets c2472 - Status of the invoice

24720001 - open

24720002 - posted to accounting system.

paymentTermsCode.description: Gets or sets c27 - Payment terms code for the invoice.

totalAmountInInvoiceCurrency.description: Gets or sets total amount of the invoice in invoice currency.

totalAmountInBalanceSheetCurrency.description: Gets or sets total amount of the invoice in balance sheet currency.

postingText.description: Gets or sets optional posting text for accountig system.

qrCode.description: Gets or sets complete QR-Code for payment.

qrIban.description: Gets or sets QR-IBAN for payment.

qrQrrReference.description:
Gets or sets QRR-Reference for payment.
Only numeric characters are allowed.

qrScorReference.description: Gets or sets SCOR-Reference for payment.

qrTypeCode.description:
Gets or sets c985 - Type of QR-Code for payment

9850001 - Switzerland qr with reference no

9850002 - Switzerland qr with SCOR no

9850003 - Switzerland qr without reference.

positions.description: Gets the list of invoice positions.

taxes.description: Gets the list of input taxes.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

purchaseInvoiceVatId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

vatCode.description: Gets or sets c23 - Type of applied input tax.

vatRate.description: Gets or sets input tax rate.

vatQuota.description: Gets or sets input tax quota.

amountInInvoiceCurrency.description: Gets or sets amount for the tax code excluding input tax in invoice currency.

vatAmountInInvoiceCurrency.description: Gets or sets tax amount for the tax code in invoice currency.

PurchaseInvoiceInputTax.description: Represents a purchase invoice input tax record.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

invoicePositionId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

positionTypeCode.description:
Gets or sets c2455 - Type of the position

24550001 - article position

24550002 - amount position

24550003 - text position.

invoicePositionNo.description: Gets or sets get or set the invoice position number. Must be unique in a invoice.

orderPositionId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the purchase order position.

goodsReceiptPositionId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the goods receipt position.

deliveryNoteId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the delivery note in the material management system.

deliveryNotePositionNo.description: Gets or sets position number of the delivery note position in the material management system.

quantityInDeliveryUnit.description:
Gets or sets invoice quantity in delivery units.
Required for position type article .

deliveryUnitCode.description:
Gets or sets c28 - Delivery unit code.
Required for position type article .

quantityInPriceUnit.description:
Gets or sets invoice quantity in price units.
Required for position type article.

priceUnitCode.description:
Gets or sets c28 - Price unit code.
Required for position type article .

price.description: Gets or sets price per price unit.

surchargePercent.description: Gets or sets surcharge in percent. If this value is specified, the surcharge amount must also be specified.

surchargeAmount.description: Gets or sets the amount of a surcharge.

discountPercent.description: Gets or sets discount in percent. If this value is specified, the discount amount must also be specified.

discountAmount.description: Gets or sets the amount of a discount.

vatCode.description: Gets or sets c23 - Type of applied input tax.

vatRate.description: Gets or sets input tax rate.

vatQuota.description: Gets or sets input tax quota.

amountInInvoiceCurrency.description: Gets or sets amount of position excluding input tax in invoice currency.

amountInBalanceSheetCurrency.description: Gets or sets amount of position excluding input tax in balance sheet currency.

text.description: Gets or sets text of the position.

accountNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of the expense account.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center responsible for the order.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit responsible for the order.

orderNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of the accounting order for posting expense.

salesChannelNo.description: Gets or sets the sale channel.

assetNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of the asset the order is placed for.

costAllocationTypeCode.description:
Gets or sets c2456 - Type of cost allocation code.

24560001 - Allocation by amount

24560002 - Allocation by quantity

24560003 - Manual allocation.

portionCosts.description: Gets list of portion of cost for cost allocations.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

invoicePositionPortionOfCostsId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

goodsReceiptPositionId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the goods receipt position to which costs are allocated.

invoicePositionNo.description:
Gets or sets the invoice position number to which costs are allocated.
Item to which the costs are allocated. Can be specified as an alternative to the goods receipt item.

allocationPercent.description: Gets or sets allocation in percent.

allocationAmount.description: Gets or sets the amount of a allocation.

PurchaseInvoicePositionPortionOfCosts.description: Represents a purchase invoice position cost allocation.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets last modification date of the entry.

purchaseOrderId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

orderTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2450 - Type of the order.

orderDate.description: Gets or sets date of the order.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

purchaseOrderNo.description: Gets or sets purchase order number of the entry.

externalPurchseOrderId.description: Gets or sets external id of the entry - may be used instead of the technical identification.

supplierId.description: Gets or sets id of the supplier of the entry.

supplierNo.description: Gets or sets the supplier number of the purchase order.

purchaseOrderTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2462 - How was the order placed? Post, eMail,...

purchaseOrderStateCode.description: Gets or sets c2452 - State of the order e.g. recorded, placed, partially delivered,...

currency.description: Gets or sets currency ISO code.

exchangeRate.description: Gets or sets exchange rate used for purchase when not in balance sheet currency.

isPurchaseOrderSent.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the purchase order was been sent.

purchaseOrderSendDate.description: Gets or sets date the purchase order was sent.

deliveryDateRequested.description: Gets or sets requested delivery date, if no confirmation, this is written to the delivery date.

deliveryDate.description: Gets or sets confirmed delivery date. Equals requested delivery date if not confirmed.

priceDate.description: Gets or sets date of the price information the purchase is based on.

orderConfirmationDateRequested.description: Gets or sets date the supplier should confirm the order.

orderConfirmationDate.description: Gets or sets date the order was confirmed.

orderConfirmationNo.description: Gets or sets order confirmation no from the supplier.

warehouseId.description: Gets or sets identifier of the warehouse.

storageAreaId.description: Gets or sets identifier of the storage area.

shippingAddressCode.description: Gets or sets c2464 - Where is the purchase delivered? (24640001 - pickup address, 24640002 - shipping address).

shippingBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the shipping business partner address (Required for shippings).

pickupBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the pickup business partner address (Required for pickups).

pickupEmployeeBusinessPartnerId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the contact person at the pickup address.

shippingTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2463 - How is the purchase shipped? Pick up, lorry, post,...

incoTermsCode.description: Gets or sets c2467 - Incoterms define the responsibilities of exporters and importers in the arrangement of shipments and the transfer of liability involved at various stages of the transaction.

incoTermsLocation.description: Gets or sets location for the incoterms.

destinationDeliveryDateRequested.description: Gets or sets requested destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility.

destinationDeliveryDate.description: Gets or sets destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility.

ordererBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the business partner address of the orderer.

ordererEmployeeBusinessPartnerId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the orderer.

supplierBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the supplier business partner address.

supplierEmployeeBusinessPartnerId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the contact person at the supplier.

supplierNotes.description: Gets or sets supplier related notes and remarks.
supplierNotes.example: Every year in early summer, the supplier runs a promotion on all metal goods. Internal task recorded in the info centre so that we can place a bulk order for screws and fasteners.

ordererPersonnelNo.description: Gets or sets the personnel number of the orderer.

internalRemarks.description: Gets or sets internal remarks about the supplier.
internalRemarks.example: Promised delivery dates are never met.

externalRemarks.description: Gets or sets remarks added to the supplier order.
externalRemarks.example: Please let us know the delivery dates in more detail.

openingText.description: Gets or sets text opening the supplier order.
openingText.example: You have received the following order. Please check the items and confirm the delivery by means of an order confirmation.

footerText.description: Gets or sets final remarks concerning the order put in the footer of the order.
footerText.example: Please inform us of any price changes in writing at the e-mail address purchase@memor.ch. Thank you very much.

materialRequirementsPlanningGroupCode.description: Gets or sets c402 - Material requirements planning (MRP) group.

reference.description: Gets or sets reference that helps reidentify the purchase.

originOrderNo.description: Gets or sets order number of the associated sales or production order.

automaticCompletion.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the purchase order is automatically completed once it has been fully delivered and invoiced.

sourcePurchaseOrderId.description:
Gets or sets technical identification of the source purchase order.
If Infosystem.Performis.WebApi.IF2Performis.Dtos.PurchaseOrder.OrderTypeCode equals 24500002, this is the original order.

sourcePurchaseOrderNo.description:
Gets or sets purchase order number of the source purchase order.
If Infosystem.Performis.WebApi.IF2Performis.Dtos.PurchaseOrder.OrderTypeCode equals 24500002, this is the original order.

positionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the order position.

positionNo.description: Gets or sets item number. Format and conditions via company settings.

modifyUser.description: Gets or sets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets or sets date the entry was last modified.

positionTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2455 - Type of the position 1: article 2: amount 3: text.

articleId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the article.

articleNo.description: Gets or sets article number for identification by the users.

text.description: Gets or sets text of the position.

conversionFactorStockUnitDeliveryUnit.description: Gets or sets coefficient stock unit -> delivery unit.

conversionFactorDeliveryUnitStockUnit.description: Gets or sets coefficient delivery unit -> stock unit.

conversionFactorDeliveryUnitPriceUnit.description: Gets or sets coefficient delivery unit -> price unit.

conversionFactorPriceUnitDeliveryUnit.description: Gets or sets coefficient price unit -> delivery unit.

orderQuantityStockUnit.description: Gets or sets order quantity in stock units.

orderQuantityDeliverUnit.description: Gets or sets order quantity in delivery units.

orderQuantityPriceUnit.description: Gets or sets order quantity in price units.

deliveryUnitCode.description: Gets or sets c28 - Delivery unit code.

priceUnitCode.description: Gets or sets c28 - Price unit code.

priceTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2458 - Pricetype 1: Normal price 2: Special offer price.

price.description: Gets or sets price per unit.

isVatInPriceIncluded.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether vat is in price included.

vatCode.description: Gets or sets c23 - Type of input tax (vat, input tax).

discountPercentage.description: Gets or sets discount in percent.

surchargePercentage.description: Gets or sets surcharge in percent.

discountAmount.description: Gets or sets discount in money.

surchargeAmount.description: Gets or sets surcharge in money.

warehouseId.description: Gets or sets identifier of the warehouse - Overrides values in header.

storageAreaId.description: Gets or sets identifier of the storage location - Overrides values in header.

shippingTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2463 - How is the purchase delivered? Pick up, lorry, post,...  - Overrides values in header.

priceOriginCode.description: Gets or sets c2459 - Origin of the price information 1: Set manually 2: Supplier article price 3: Supplier article scale price 4: Current materials purchase price.

accountNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of the expense account.

assetNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of the asset the order is placed for.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center responsible for the order.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit responsible for the order.

salesChannelNo.description: Gets or sets identifies the sale channel.

orderNo.description: Gets or sets identifier of the accounting order for posting expense.

deliveryDateRequested.description: Gets or sets requested delivery date, if no confirmation, this is written to the delivery date. - Overrides value from the header.

deliveryDate.description: Gets or sets confirmed delivery date. Equals requested delivery date if not confirmed. - Overrides value from the header.

destinationDeliveryDateRequested.description: Gets or sets requested destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility. - Overrides value from the header.

destinationDeliveryDate.description: Gets or sets destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility. - Overrides value from the header.

countryOfOrigin.description: Gets or sets ISO code of country of origin.

tariffCode.description: Gets or sets c28 - Customs tariff number.

orderConfirmationDate.description: Gets or sets date the order was confirmed. - Overrides value from the header.

orderConfirmationNo.description: Gets or sets order confirmation no from the supplier. - Overrides value from the header.

orderConfirmationDateRequested.description: Gets or sets date the supplier should confirm the order. - Overrides value from the header.

isFullyCharged.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the purchase position has been fully charged or whether it is still partially open.

netAmount.description: Gets or sets net amount (gross - tax) of the order position.

grossAmount.description: Gets or sets total cost of order position.

vatAmount.description: Gets or sets amount of taxes for the order position.

isPrinted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an item is printed on the order document or not.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

supplierId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

businessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets business partner address id of the entry.

externalSupplierId.description: Gets or sets external id of the entry - may be used instead of the technical identification.

origin.description: Gets or sets origin of the entry.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

supplierNo.description: Gets or sets supplier number of the entry.

isLocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether supplier is locked for purchasing.

supplierCategoryCode.description: Gets or sets c2465 - Category of the supplier.

supplierRatingCode.description: Gets or sets c2466 - User code to set the rating of the supplier.

ourCustomerNo.description: Gets or sets our customer identification with the supplier.

paymentTermsCode.description: Gets or sets c27 - Payment terms with the supplier.

printoutCopyQuantity.description: Gets or sets quantity of the purchase order printout copies.

printPrices.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the purchase prices are shown on the purchase order document.

orderChannelCode.description: Gets or sets c2462 - Order channel, how to order from this supplier e.g. by post,by email, by telephone, by fax, by internet.

confirmationPeriod.description: Gets or sets number of days until an order confirmation is expected.

reminderConfirmationPeriod.description: Gets or sets number of days until a reminder is generated for order confirmation - after confirmation period.

reminderDeliveryPeriod.description: Gets or sets number of days until a reminder is generated for a missed delivery.

currency.description: Gets or sets currency ISO code.

landedCostsInPercentage.description: Gets or sets landed costs are additional charges or costs incurred for the purchase order.

vatCode.description: Gets or sets default input tax applied for the suppliers invoices.

freightTypeCode.description: Gets or sets c2463 - Freight type e.g. lorry, post, truck, courier, collection etc.

incoTermsCode.description: Gets or sets c2467 - Incoterms define the responsibilities of exporters and importers in the arrangement of shipments and the transfer of liability involved at various stages of the transaction.

incoTermsLocation.description: Gets or sets location for the incoterms.

deliveryDuration.description: Gets or sets delivery time for order proposal calculations and warning in the order programme (e.g. 5 days delivery time no longer works for tomorrow) Specification in whole days.

deliveryDays.description: Gets or sets delivery days from dropdown box (multiselect) for delivery date proposal, default Monday - Friday checked. Bitmap, starting with Monday (1st digit) 0=not selected, 1=selected.

invoiceBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets business partner address id for invoicing.

pickupBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets business partner address id for pickup.

notes.description: Gets or sets supplier related notes and remarks.

automaticCompletion.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether purchase orders with this supplier have automatic completion per default.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

voucherType.description: Gets or sets type of voucher e.g. 'FA' for invoice.

voucherNo.description: Gets or sets voucher number of the receivable.

lineNo.description: Gets or sets line number of the receivable within the voucher.

openItemId.description: Gets or sets unique open item identifier of receivable.

financialInterfaceId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the voucher.

totalAmount.description: Gets or sets total amount of the receivable.

openAmount.description: Gets or sets amount still open. If value is 0, the receivable is fully settled.

openItemCriterion1.description: Gets or sets open item criterion - used to categorise open items.

openItemCriterion2.description: Gets or sets open item criterion - used to categorise open items.

openItemCriterion3.description: Gets or sets open item criterion - used to categorise open items.

openItemCriterion4.description: Gets or sets open item criterion - used to categorise open items.

ReceivablesPaymentStatus.description: Information about the payment status of an open item.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

absenceId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

serviceProviderDayId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service provider day.

serviceProviderId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service provider.

absenceDate.description: Gets or sets date of the absence.

absenceTypeId.description: Gets or sets identification of the absence type.

hours.description: Gets or sets duration of absence in hours.

timeFrom.description: Gets or sets start of absence.

timeUntil.description: Gets or sets end of absence.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

personnelNo.description: Gets or sets personnel number of the employee.

timePeriodCode.description:
Gets or sets c575 - Predefined time periods

5750020 - Entire day

5750040 - Morning

5750060 - Afternoon.

absenceRequestId.description: Gets or sets the identification for this absence request.

isLocked.description: Gets or sets this absence is locked for changes in performis UI.

isApproved.description: Gets a value indicating whether this absence is approved.

originId.description: Gets or sets id in the system of origin.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

allowanceId.description: Gets or sets identification of the allowance.

serviceProviderDayId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service provider day.

serviceProviderId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service provider.

personnelNo.description: Gets or sets personnel number of the employee.

allowanceDate.description: Gets or sets date of the allowance.

allowanceDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets identification of the allowance definition.

baseValue.description: Gets or sets base value for the calculation.

percentage.description: Gets or sets percentage rate for the calculation.

amount.description: Gets or sets amount of the allowance.

apply.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the allowance will be applied or not.

exclude.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the allowance is excluded from use.

isLocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the allowance is locked for changes in performis UI.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center identifier.

isApproved.description: Gets a value indicating whether this allowance is approved.

originId.description: Gets or sets id in the system of origin.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entity.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entity.

presenceTimeId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of the presence time dataset.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company number identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

serviceProviderId.description: Gets or sets id of the "Leistungstrger".

serviceProviderDayId.description: Gets or sets identifier to the "Leistungstrger-Tag".

personnelNo.description: Gets or sets personnel number of the employee.

presenceDate.description: Gets or sets date of presence.

hours.description: Gets or sets hours the service provider was present.

timeFrom.description: Gets or sets time the service provider started work.

timeUntil.description: Gets or sets time the service provider ended work.

isLocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the presence time record is locked for all but the origin system.

isApproved.description: Gets a value indicating whether this presence time is approved.

originId.description: Gets or sets id in the system of origin.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

serviceProviderId.description: Gets or sets id of the service provider.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company number identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

shortDescription.description: Gets or sets short identifier/abbreviation/acronym of the service provider.

description.description: Gets or sets full description / Name of the service provider.

externalId.description: Gets or sets identification in an external system e.g. the card ID from a locking system can be included here. It is not the identification from the system of origin.

function.description: Gets or sets function, position or title of the service provider.

serviceProviderTypeCode.description:
Gets or sets c286 - Type of the service provider

1 - Mitarbeiter - Employees

2 - Maschinen   - Machines

3 - Kleingerte - Small devices

5 - Allgemein   - Universal.

department.description: Gets or sets department the service provider is assigned to.

defaultServiceTypeId.description: Gets or sets default service type id of the service provider .

employeeId.description: Gets or sets the employee in BAF.

originId.description: Gets or sets id in the system of origin.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

serviceRecordId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

serviceProviderId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service provider.

personnelNo.description: Gets or sets personnel number of the employee.

serviceRecordDate.description: Gets or sets day on which the service was provided.

serviceTypeId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service type.

serviceProviderDayId.description: Gets or sets identification of the service provider day.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center identifier.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit identifier.

period.description: Gets or sets accounting period of the entry. Format YYYYMM (e.g. 202401).

text.description: Gets or sets description of the work done.

quantity.description: Gets or sets the amount of work performed. The unit depends on the type of service.

timeFrom.description: Gets or sets work start time.

timeUntil.description: Gets or sets work end time.

serviceRecordStatusCode.description:
Gets c291 - State of the service entry

2910010 - Provisional              - Provisorisch

2910020 - Recorded                 - Erfasst

2910025 - Not ready for billing    - Nicht verrechnungsbereit

2910030 - Ready for billing        - Verrechnungsbereit

2910040 - Billed                   - Verrechnet

2910045 - No billing               - Keine Verrechnung.

isLocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service record is locked for changes in performis UI.

machineServiceProviderDayId.description: Gets or sets for machine service records only. Identification of the service provider day of the machine operator (person).

serviceRecordGuid.description: Gets or sets globally Unique Identifier of the service record. Is set automatically if not specified.

noCaccPosting.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service record will not be posted to cost accounting.

isApproved.description: Gets a value indicating whether this service record is approved.

originId.description: Gets or sets id in the system of origin.

originStatusCode.description:
Gets or sets c577 - Status of the origin

5770100 - not approved       - nicht freigegeben

5770200 - partially approved - teilweise freigegeben

5770500 - approved           - freigegeben.
